EmailTemplate.description: This template is used for the Push eDM Builder
EmailTemplate.name: PushEDM
EmailTemplate.subject: The information requested from Australia Post
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Thanks for your call. Here is some information that may be of assistance to you.
%%BodyContent%%
Regards
Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post, based on your request to receive this information. You have not been added to any email subscriptions. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
